description: This file defines a React functional component 'Login' that renders a login form. It manages user input, handles form submission to authenticate the user via an API, and redirects upon successful login. It also displays error messages and loading states.

methods.name: Login({ onAuthSuccess })
methods.description: React component managing login form, user authentication, redirect, and error handling.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls API for login, manages response, and navigates accordingly.
